paper_title: Extraction Algorithm of Hom-Lie Algebras Based on Solvable and Nilpotent Groups
abstract: In the theory of groups, investigations of the properties of the solvable and nilpotent groups are well-developed. The purpose of the paper is to establish a theory of the solvable and nilpotent Hom-Lie algebras analogous to that of the solvable and nilpotent groups.
